item.title: Triggers by Marshall Goldsmith
item.description: parent: books Triggers by Marshall Goldsmith Summary Understanding how our environment triggers us to act positively or negatively will help us to change and ensure our habits stick. Key Ideas Our environment is the biggest triggering mechanism that undermines our efforts to be a better person. Create a set of active Engaging Questions - questions that we ask ourselves if we tried to do our best. The Daily Questions technique can help act as a commitment device by ensuring we stay on track.
